name: Chibi Knight
description:
A cute little arcade platformer game, try to beat your record every single time!

This game i made it for mobile in just 3 days, you can play the mobile version here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.Richard08.ChibiKnight

I hope you like it!

----------- PC - CONTROLS ----------

"R"Restart game."F4"
Fullscreen.
"X"Jump."Z"Attack.
